featuredProjects.title: D11-react-native-fast-image
featuredProjects.description: High performance React Native image component optimized for speed and efficiency.

featuredProjects.title: Marco
featuredProjects.description: Tool to track and optimize app's performance with ease, providing insights for performance improvements.

featuredProjects.title: Checkmate
featuredProjects.description: Tool to streamline test case management, making it easier to organize and execute tests efficiently.

featuredProjects.title: deFrost
featuredProjects.description: Tool to detect frozen frames in React Native apps, helping improve user experience by identifying UI freezes.

featuredProjects.title: rn-benchmarking
featuredProjects.description: A tool for benchmarking React Native applications to identify performance bottlenecks and optimize runtime efficiency.

upcomingProjects.title: DOTA
upcomingProjects.description: Helps in over the air updates for React Native applications, enabling seamless updates without app store submissions.

upcomingProjects.title: INFER
upcomingProjects.description: Enables over the air delivery of lightweight ML models, bringing machine learning capabilities to mobile applications efficiently.

upcomingProjects.title: Guardian
upcomingProjects.description: A comprehensive solution that helps in user authentication and security for mobile and web applications.

upcomingProjects.title: Flash
upcomingProjects.description: Server-driven UI framework that allows dynamic UI updates without app releases, improving flexibility and user experience.

about.title: About DreamSportsLabs
about.description: DreamSportsLabs is an initiative within Dream11 aimed at fostering innovation and collaboration in the tech community. It serves as an umbrella for all open source initiatives and community engagement at Dream11.

cards.title: Open Source Projects
cards.description: DreamSportsLabs has incubated 6 open source projects including react-native-fast-image, marco, checkmate, deFrost, rn-benchmarking, and d11-react-native-mqtt.

cards.title: Community Engagement
cards.description: We actively engage with the community by hosting meetups like React-Mumbai and Kong Meetup, as well as sharing our learnings through our tech blog at tech.dream11.in.

cards.title: React Native Contributions
cards.description: We actively contribute to the React Native repository by triaging and fixing issues, and have contributed to release testing of React Native.

cards.title: Innovation Focus
cards.description: We're constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible in sports technology, from data analytics to AI-driven insights and beyond.

collaborations.title: React Native Testing
collaborations.description: Dream11 contributed to React Native by participating in testing of React 19 features in react-native 0.78

collaborations.title: React Native Release Crew
collaborations.description: Dream11 contributed to React Native by participating in release testing of react 0.79

collaborations.title: React Native Issue Triaging
collaborations.description: Active participation in triaging and fixing issues in the React Native community.

openSourceProjectsCards.title: react-native-fast-image
openSourceProjectsCards.description: FastImage is a React Native component for displaying images with better performance, handling caching, and controlling priority.

openSourceProjectsCards.title: marco
openSourceProjectsCards.description: A framework that helps developers to generate network mocks for their projects, improving testing and development workflows.

openSourceProjectsCards.title: checkmate
openSourceProjectsCards.description: A tool that helps verify and validate application behavior and configurations across different environments.

otherProjects.title: deFrost
otherProjects.description: A tool to improve React Native loading times and user experience by optimizing startup processes.

otherProjects.title: rn-benchmarking
otherProjects.description: A tool for benchmarking React Native applications to identify performance bottlenecks and optimization opportunities.

hero.title: Open Source by Dream11
hero.description: DreamSportsLabs is Dream11's umbrella for all open source initiatives and community engagement, fostering innovation in tech.

trending.title: TRENDING
trending.description: Before public release, we always give hints on what we're working on. This is what we've been up to lately.
